movies.title: Colours of Passion
movies.plot: Inspired by the real life of Raja Ravi Varma, a young Raja Ravi Verma looking for an inspiration for a painting. He meets a girl and starts the painting. His first two paintings of Lakshmi and Saraswati are praised but after the woman starts feeling love for him, she seduces him. He then starts a relationship with her, which destroys his inspiration, and he starts painting inappropriate images, which brings anger in people.
movies.simplePlot: A look into the life of 19th century Indian painter Raja Ravi Varma.

biography.bio: Randeep Hooda was born in a small village called Daseya in the Rohtak district of Haryana. His mother, Asha Hooda, is a BJP politician and his father is a surgeon by profession. He did schooling from Delhi Public School before moving to Australia for higher studies. He is Bachelors in Marketing & Human Resource Management. He made his film debut in Monsoon Wedding (2001) where he plays NRI (Non Resident Indian). He got the role in Monsoon Wedding primarily because of his Australian accent rather then his acting skills or good looks. However even after a powerful performance in Monsoon Wedding he had to wait for 4 years to get a second project. He finally got lucky and Ramgopal Verma cast him as lead in a gangster flick "D" (2005). "D" was a turning point in his career and he suddenly became a household name across the country. The "D" which supposedly portrays Dawood Ibrahim's real life gave Randeep Hooda a grand entry into tinsel town. Recently he got the lead role in "Karma, Confessions and Holi" (2006) produced by Drena De Niro.
biography.name: Randeep Hooda

biography.bio: Nandana Sen was born on August 19, 1967 in Calcutta, West Bengal, India. She is an actress and producer, known for Black (2005), The World Unseen (2007) and The War Within (2005). She has been married to John Makinson since June 22, 2013.
biography.name: Nandana Sen

biography.bio: Paresh Rawal was born on May 30, 1950 in Bombay, State of Bombay, India. He is an actor and producer, known for OMG: Oh My God! (2012), Hera Pheri (2000) and Andaz Apna Apna (1994). He is married to Swaroop Sampat. They have two children.
biography.name: Paresh Rawal

biography.bio: Ashish Vidyarthi was born on June 19, 1962 in Tellicherry, Kerala, India. He is an actor, known for Barfi! (2012), Haider (2014) and Kaho Naa... Pyaar Hai (2000).
biography.name: Ashish Vidyarthi

biography.bio: Sachin Khedekar is an actor, known for Tere Naam (2003), Singham (2011) and Maattrraan (2012).
biography.name: Sachin Khedekar

biography.bio: Darshan Jariwala was born on September 29, 1958 in Bombay, State of Bombay, India. He is an actor, known for Kahaani (2012), Million Dollar Arm (2014) and Ajab Prem Ki Ghazab Kahani (2009).
biography.name: Darshan Jariwala

biography.bio: Vikram Gokhale is an actor and director, known for Hum Dil De Chuke Sanam (1999), Bang Bang (2014) and Hey Ram (2000).
biography.name: Vikram Gokhale

biography.bio: Jim Boeven is a german born American Actor. He grew up in Cologne, Germany where he started his acting career and starred in a multitude of TV productions and Feature Films. Jim Boeven is an established European/American actor with star quality and dual German/ American citizenship. Jim speaks flawless English, and has dubbed upwards of 300 movies in German. A celebrity in his native Germany, Jim Boeven is fully and legally qualified to work in America. Jim has been a lead actor and series regular on 4 international-selling television series aired on major networks - the equivalent of ABC, CBS, NBC. Jim's TV series have aired in 24 countries. In fact, Jim's European TV career is so prolific that he has appeared in 450 high-profile television shows as either a lead/star, recurring and/or guest star. Jim has a supporting role in the Paul Schrader film THE CANYONS written by Bret Easton Ellis, recently shot an episode of CSI: CYBER for Jerry Bruckheimer Television and CBS and currently shoots for JANE THE VIRGIN. Jim appeared in the Bruce Willis/MGM film HART'S WAR directed and produced by Gregory Hoblit with David Foster, David Ladd, and Arnold Rifkin. Jim also has a role in the Bollywood film COLOURS OF PASSION starring acclaimed Indian actor Randeep Hooda and directed by Ketan Mehta, considered one of the all-time greatest directors of Indian cinema. Jim's vast and varied acting career has afforded him the opportunity to work with many show biz luminaries including Colin Farrell, Bruce Willis, Brenda Fricker, Victor Garber, producer Warren Ostergard (THE BAG MAN with Robert De Niro and John Cusack), director Alex Chapple (LAW & ORDER: SPECIAL VICTIMS UNIT, BLUE BLOODS), and actress Kathleen Robertson (Steven Bochco's MURDER IN THE FIRST on TNT). What you ultimately have in Jim Boeven is a proven Pro with an intriguing face and an overall electric presence.
biography.name: Jim Boeven

biography.bio: Suhasini was born in Patna where she spent the early part of her childhood. She lost her father when she was only three and was brought up by her mother, noted documentary filmmaker and film historian Vijaya Mulay. She was attracted toward films because of her. In 1965 she was chosen by Pears Soap to be its model. It was this ad film which caught Mrinal Sen's attention and he signed her for Bhuvan Shome (1969). Though Bhuvan Shome proved to be a milestone in Indian cinema, Suhasini did not pursue acting as a career. Instead she enrolled at the prestigious McGill University in Montreal, Canada for a course in agricultural technology with specialization in soil chemistry and microbiology. She also obtained a degree in mass communication, and majored in film, radio, TV, journalism and print from the same university. Suhasini returned to India in 1975 and worked as an assistant to Satyajit Ray in the Bengali film Jana Aranya. Later she joined Mrinal Sen as an assistant director in Mrigaya. Since then, she has been actively producing films and has made over 60 documentaries. She achieved national awards for four of them. Almost 30 years after Bhuvan Shome, she made a great comeback to mainstream Bollywood cinema, through Gulzar's Hu Tu Tu for which she received another national award as the best supporting actress. She has been playing mother roles in Bollywood since then. She has worked on Jaane Kya Baat Hui, a television serial. Currently she completed her latest film PEEDA directed by Hemant Verma. PEEDA recently received best feature film award at FOG film festival USA.
biography.name: Suhasini Mulay

biography.bio: Prashant Narayanan is an actor and assistant director, known for Murder 2 (2011), Waisa Bhi Hota Hai Part II (2003) and Shadows of Time (2004).
biography.name: Prashant Narayanan

biography.bio: Vipin Sharma is an actor and editor, known for Like Stars on Earth (2007), Rainbow (2015) and Gangs of Wasseypur (2012).
biography.name: Vipin Sharma

biography.bio: Shri Vallabh Vyas is an actor, known for Lagaan (2001), Chandni Bar (2001) and Sarfarosh (1999).
biography.name: Shri Vallabh Vyas

biography.bio: Rashaana Shah is an actress and producer, known for Colours of Passion (2008), Meenaxi: Tale of 3 Cities (2004) and Manjhi: The Mountain Man (2015).
biography.name: Rashaana Shah

biography.bio: Feryna Wazheir is an actress, known for Airlift (2016), Secret Heart (2016) and Colours of Passion (2008).
biography.name: Feryna Wazheir

biography.bio: Rajat Kapoor was born on February 11, 1961 in New Delhi, India. He is an actor and director, known for Dil Chahta Hai (2001), Ankhon Dekhi (2013) and Drishyam (2015).
biography.name: Rajat Kapoor
